name: Broken Spectre - Director's Cut
summary:
VR Awards: Winner for Best VR Experience
GDC Best in Play Winner
Fearfest Best Video Game Winner
SIGGRAPH official selection
Raindance Immersive - Best Immersive Game

25 years ago your father climbed the mountain and never came back. 
{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}

Now he’s calling for you with updated graphics, smoother interactions, and quality of life upgrades in the Director’s Cut.

Casey’s dark journey begins when she receives a cryptic message from her father, which leads her back...
